SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

SET(CONFIGFILE_HEADERS
    configfile.h
)
SET(CONFIGFILE_SOURCES
    configfile.cpp
)

#ADD_DEFINITIONS("-fPIC")
#ADD_LIBRARY(configfile SHARED ${CONFIGFILE_HEADERS} ${CONFIGFILE_SOURCES})
SDP_ADD_LIBRARY(CONFIGFILE configfile)
SDP_LIB_INSTALL_HEADERS(CONFIGFILE)
